projectPurpose: To provide a foundational Layer 1 blockchain for interchain, asset-agnostic privacy, enabling private transactions and interactions for any asset across different blockchain networks.
mainFeatures: Asset-agnostic privacy (unified shielded set for any asset)

alternatives.name: Oasis Network
mainFeatures: Separation of consensus and execution layers

marketPositioning: Namada positions itself as a shielded asset hub and a composable privacy layer for the entire multichain ecosystem. Its key differentiator is providing asset-agnostic privacy across various chains, allowing users to shield any asset (fungible or non-fungible) and perform private cross-chain interactions within a unified shielded set. This contrasts with privacy solutions focused primarily on native coins or optional transaction privacy on a single chain. Namada also incentivizes privacy through shielding rewards, promoting privacy as a public good for the multichain network.
